description:
The Keroro Platoon opens a ramen shop, selling all kinds of strange and creative ramen, such as one made with Gundam-shaped noodles.  But Aki convinces them to go with flavor over originality.  Later, Joriri shows up and gives them all kinds of advice that is his usual style of indecipherable.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aki, Real Ramen / Joriri, False Ramen
秋本当のラーメン であります / ジョリリ 偽りのラーメン であります
